title: Latest updates: East Midlands Live on Tuesday 11 July 2017 - BBC News
summary: body found in search for missing 12-year-old .
alarm was raised on monday evening after reports a boy had fallen into the river trent .
hundreds of people helped search for owen jenkins around beeston marina .
news , sport , travel and weather updates will resume at 08:00 wednesday .

documents.title: our live coverage
text: regular live coverage on this page has ended for the day , but breaking news , sport and travel updates will continue appear through the night .
east midlands live returns from 08:00 on wednesday .

text: bryn coleman from nottinghamshire fire and rescue said crews were deeply saddened by the 12-year-old 's death .

documents.title: wistow maze : can you deduce the design ?
text: can you solve the mystery of the amazing wistow maze ?
the maze in leicestershire , which is 20 times bigger than the one at hampton court , changes its design every year .
it has a unique design with three miles of pathways across eight acres .
it will open to the public later this month .
the game is afoot !
@ twitterid
that is a maze ing !
by the way wat son designed it ?
i hope you 're coming down to solve the clues and find out whodunnit @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : heavy rain to continue
text: this evening will see heavy bursts of rain , which will ease overnight but it will remain cloudy .
it will feel mild with temperatures reaching 12c ( 54f ) .
tomorrow will be a cloudy start to the day but it will brighten up .
there will be some light winds and sunny spells with temperatures reaching 20c ( 68 f ) .
author: Sara Blizzard
BBC Weather

documents.title: owen jenkins : parents tribute to their 'champion '
text: the parents of owen jenkins , who died after falling into water near beeston marina , have paid tribute to their `` amazing son '' .
nicola and gary jenkins said : `` our little boy , our english rose , our champion will be missed and never forgotten .
`` we wish to thank all of the emergency services , who have been amazing , and all of the people that helped to look for owen .
`` thank you for your support . ''
nottinghamshire police said the family has asked for privacy at this difficult time .
author: Heather Burman
Journalist, BBC News Online

documents.title: car head rests 'thrown at police ' during chase
text: a 21-year-old passenger has been accused of throwing head rests at police cars during a chase through south derbyshire in the early hours of wednesday .
the pursuit had begun in wilmorton and continued through castle donington and swadlincote before the car was stopped near calke abbey using a stinger device .
the 17-year-old driver has been charged with driving without a licence , failing to stop and dangerous driving .
the passenger has been charged with causing a danger to road users .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: green light for derbyshire whisky distillery
text: derbyshire 's first whisky distillery has been given the go-ahead by amber valley borough council .
white peak distillery will be based inside the industrial units at derwent works in ambergate and could be producing whisky by the end of the year .
the spirit will take at least three years to age , so in the meantime they 'll be making gin .
author: Wesley Mallin
Reporter, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: sun helps nettles and himalayan balsam grow
text: check out these amazing of pit lane park near stapleford .
it was a cracking weekend weather-wise , and if you 're green-fingered you 've probably spent a fair bit of time out in the garden .
you may have spotted one or two giant weeds , which have been growing thick and fast around nottinghamshire .
gardening expert guy stephenson , showed me around .
he said a mix of strong sun and spots of heavy rain meant weeds such as nettles and himalayan balsam have become much bigger than normal .
author: Marcus Alton
Reporter, Radio Nottingham

documents.title: traffic barriers to be installed around trent bridge ground
text: traffic barriers will be installed on bridgford road and radcliffe road in west bridgford ahead of the cricket matches this month .
nottinghamshire county council said the barriers will reduce the width of the road slightly but it will aim to keep people walking on the pavements safer .

paul mckay , service director covering public protection at nottinghamshire county council , said : in line with other national events and following advice from central government to nottinghamshire police , we are carrying out these measures due to the large numbers of people expected on pavements around the cricket ground during forthcoming events and these barriers will also help guide pedestrians away from the busy roads .
there is no specific intelligence on any possible forthcoming threat - this is a precautionary measure .
this type of measure is becoming standard across the country at all major events as we have seen at lord 's , wimbledon and glastonbury recently . ''
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: new deal for forest green captain noble
text: new deal for forest green captain noble

documents.title: rams to face eustace 's harriers in friendly
text: derby county play their first pre-season friendly tonight at kidderminster harriers - managed by former rams midfielder john eustace .
the game - which kicks off at aggborough at 19:45 - will be followed by a trip to moss rose to play macclesfield on saturday .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: derby terrorist handed five-year jail sentence
text: a derby man has been jailed for five years and three months after travelling to turkey to try to join so-called islamic state .
mudassir hussain , 31 , from gladstone street , was detained in turkey , brought back to the uk and arrested at heathrow airport in january .
he pleaded guilty at sheffield crown court today to preparing acts of terrorism .

det ch supt clive wain , head of the north east counter terrorism unit , said : `` by pleading guilty hussain has admitted his intention was to take part in the conflict in syria and was aware that he may be killed .
`` we were not aware of hussain 's intentions prior to him travelling and therefore by the time we intervened he had already committed an offence .
`` however by reporting their concerns hussain 's family may well have saved lives , including his own . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your tributes for owen jenkins
text: many of you have left tributes on facebook for owen jenkins .
ann haig said : `` so sad thoughts are with his family , a terrible tragedy , rip ''
bill richardson said : `` my prayers and thoughts go out to his family and friends so sad . ''
tracie perrin said : `` such terrible news .
deepest sympathy goes to his family and friends . ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: chesterfield sign blades ' reed on loan
text: chesterfield sign blades ' reed on loan

documents.title: owen jenkins an 'enthusiastic and gregarious young man '
text: the school where owen jenkins was a pupil has paid tribute to the `` popular student '' .
year seven pupils and staff at chilwell school have started a tribute board for the 12-year-old , who died after falling into the river trent yesterday .
he was an enthusiastic and gregarious young man .
he was an exceptional sports man and we recently celebrated his success from sports day , when he broke several long standing school records ; most notably the 200m .
owen was a key member of our community and we are heartbroken at his loss .
he was honourable , generous of spirit and frequently put the concern of others before his own .
he respected everybody equally .
our thoughts are very much with owen 's immediate family during this difficult time . ''
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'civil war ' cannon ball found in vegetable patch set to be auctioned
text: cannon balls , human toe bones and belt buckles are among a collection of historical oddities dug up in gardens in leicestershire set to go under the hammer .
the items have been found in gardens in the lutterworth area over the past four decades and are being auctioned in derbyshire later this month .
auctioneer charles hanson said it was possible an iron cannon ball from the collection may have been used in the battle of naseby - one of the most brutal clashes of the english civil war .
he said : `` we understand it was discovered by someone clearing their vegetable patch in lutterworth .
`` the weapon has been confirmed by leicestershire museums and art gallery as being an iron cannon ball similar to ones found not too far away in naseby .
`` all of the items date back to the 1600s and it is extraordinary to think people found them in their gardens .
`` we do not know whether the toe bones were those of a soldier slain in battle but when you look at the other remnants of war , it is hard not to let your imagination run away with you . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: badgers 'illegally killed ' on estate
text: badgers 'illegally killed ' on estate

documents.title: owen jenkins : pictures released by rugby club
text: pictures of owen jenkins , 12 , have been released by nottingham casuals rfc , the club where he played from the age of seven .
owen died after he fell into the water near beeston marina while trying to save a friend yesterday .
the club and his family have paid tribute to the `` hero '' youngster , who was loved by many .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: killed schoolgirl 'beautiful inside and out '
text: a few of you have posted comments on facebook after a family paid tribute to 14-year-old holly brown , who died in friday 's school minibus crash .
lynne land wrote : `` a total tragedy , how her family must be feeling i just can not imagine . ''
anne wagg posted : `` beautiful girl inside and out .
so so sad . ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: owen jenkins : flowers laid and book of condolence opened
text: flowers have been laid for owen jenkins who died after falling into water near beeston marina .
it was understood owen went into the water to rescue someone who had got into difficulty .
the emergency services were called at about 18:00 and police said a body was found in the water at about 22:00 on monday .
a book of condolence has been opened and placed in the canalside heritage centre , near the marina , in memory of the 12-year-old .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: owen jenkins hailed as 'hero ' by family
text: the family of 12-year-old owen jenkins have said he was a `` hero '' .
he died after falling into water near beeston marina - he was thought to be trying to help a struggling friend .
owen 's great aunt , liz ryan , said the youngster was a `` loving , kind , considerate and well mannered lad '' .
she said : `` he went in the water to save a girl and help her get out , and he could n't swim much himself .
`` last night everybody was there the saddest part was we were told we all had to go because the light was going , the police said they had to just put the helicopters up with the infrared .
`` then in the next breath he came and said they had found him , and he was n't far . ''
liz said owen 's mother nicola and father gary were devastated and it had been `` horrendous '' for the family .
nottinghamshire police said specialist boat rescue crews were called to a stretch of the river near beeston marina at about 18:00 on monday .
a body was discovered in the water at about 22:00 after a major search .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: badgers 'illegally killed ' on estate
text: badgers 'illegally killed ' on estate

documents.title: river death boy 'rescued little girl '
text: john lives on a barge and moored in beeston yesterday .
he said the weir near the marina can look deceptively safe when it 's dry .
he told me what he saw and what he 's heard about the tragedy which unfolded yesterday .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: rugby club tribute to owen jenkins
text: the club where owen jenkins , 12 , played rugby has paid tribute to him .
a body was found last night after a massive search for owen after he fell into the water near beeston marina .
it is with profound sadness and regret that we confirm the loss of 12-year-old owen jenkins who died at beeston weir last night .
we can not express how deep our sorrow is and our thoughts are with owen 's family and friends .
owen has played rugby for nottingham casuals rfc since he was seven and was loved his team mates and everyone he came into contact with . ''
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: listen : kellogg sad about end of national badminton league
text: derby badminton star donna kellogg says she 's disappointed about the demise of the national badminton league .
the competition - won by kellogg 's team derby in 2015 - is ending after three seasons due to a lack of funding .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: bowler hit by ball 'lucky ' to escape serious injury
text: nottinghamshire quick bowler luke fletcher say he feels `` lucky '' that his injury was n't worse .
the 28-year-old was part of a horrific incident on 8 june when he was hit on the head by a ball travelling at full speed off a bat at near point blank range .
fletcher is n't expected to feature for a week or two because of concussion protocol .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Radio Nottingham sports reporter

documents.title: missing 16-year-old returns home
text: police say a 16-year-old from derbyshire who 's been missing for nearly a week has returned home and is safe .
amanuel liben vanished from his home in chesterfield on 4 july but returned last night .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: beeston marina death 'in everybody 's thoughts '
text: this is stewart craven , who 's chairman of the canalside heritage centre at beeston lock - right beside the spot where owen jenkins entered the water last night .
he told me the story of annie shaw , a young girl who drowned at the same spot in the 1930s and for whom a memorial stands in the grounds of the centre .
he said the recently restored cottages ( below ) will be open as normal today as a meeting place for people to gather and reflect on what has happened .
`` it 's going to be a very sombre day .
it 's in everybody 's thoughts , '' he said .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: delays with tram service after pedestrian hit
text: there will be some delays with trams services between nottingham royal centre and nottingham train station .
a pedestrian was hit by a tram in nottingham old market square this morning , nottinghamshire police said .
he 's not thought to have suffered serious injuries .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: young foxes star linked with move away
text: today 's bbc sport football gossip column includes speculation about the future of leicester city 's young winger demarai gray - apparently some top clubs are after him .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man arrested in connection with hyson green death
text: a 39-year-old man has been arrested in connection with the death of a man following an assault in hyson green .
he was initially arrested in connection with a separate incident at a store in top valley and remains in police custody
a 40-year-old man died yesterday in hospital after suffering a serious head injury following a dispute early on sunday morning .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: woman appointed as first bishop of loughborough
text: downing street has confirmed a second bishop for the leicester diocese .
the rev canon dr guli francis-dehqani will be known as the bishop of loughborough .
the iranian-born mother-of-three will take a full role in the work of the church across leicestershire but will also focus on supporting black , asian and minority ethnic clergy in the county .
she 'll be consecrated by the archbishop of canterbury in november .

`` guli 's rich understanding of the world church , together with her experience of training and pastoral work in the uk , will be a huge asset to our diocese , '' said the bishop of leicester , martyn snow .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: beeston marina : candles to be lit in memory of owen jenkins
text: people have been invited to light a candle in memory of owen jenkins who fell into the water at beeston marina .
# rylands methodist church open from 12-2 for ppl wanting to light a candle for 12 yr old owen jenkins who died at beeston weir last night
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: derby city council finances criticised by auditors
text: derby city council has been told it 's not making enough progress in sorting out its finances .
in september , the authority was criticised by auditors for its record-keeping and the way it values its own buildings .
now the same auditors say improvements have not been made quickly enough and have written to the government to voice their concerns .
they have also asked the authority to deliver an action plan by next week setting out how it intends to tackle the outstanding weaknesses .
the council told the bbc it had already made a `` significant '' number of changes .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: pedestrian hit by a tram
text: a man was hit by a tram in nottingham old market square this morning at about 08:55 .
a spokesman from nottinghamshire police said : `` officers were called to a report of a collision between a tram and a male pedestrian .
`` the man 's injuries are not believed to be serious . ''
there is no tram service between the royal centre in nottingham and nottingham train station .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: fire crew ripped bathroom apart to get obese woman out
text: leicestershire 's fire service has revealed how it had to rip a bathroom apart to rescue an obese woman who needed medical help .
it comes as new figures reveal a rise in the number of cases where the ambulance service required the help of fire crews to deal with severely overweight people in leicestershire .
the fire service was called out to deal with bariatric cases on 19 occasions in 2016/17 - three times as many as three years ago .
john hope , from leicestershire fire and rescue service , said : `` one lady was in the bath and we had to dismantle the whole bathroom because she was stuck .
`` we had to take all the floor out and the sink , widen the door and get her out . ''
the fire service has also been called on to hoist obese people out of bed and help them get through average-sized doors .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: beeston marina : family 'had a lot of heartache '
text: speaking before the body was found , family member , elizabeth ryan , said she was returning home when she heard owen had fallen into the weir at beeston marina .
she said : `` we were on our way back from skegness [ when we heard ] .
he was with a gang of friends and he 's gone into the weir .
`` he 's only 12 , but for his age he 's a very tall guy we 've had a lot of heartache , it 's quite stressful . ''
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : east midlands weather forecast
text: what 's in store for tuesday ?
author: Rich Davis
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: family pays tribute to teenager killed in school trip bus crash
text: the family of a 14-year-old girl who died in a minibus crash during a school trip have paid tribute to their `` beautiful daughter and twin sister '' .
holly brown , a pupil at john taylor high school in barton-under-needwood in staffordshire , was killed when the bus she was travelling in was involved in a collision with a bin lorry in birmingham .
in a statement , her mother , father and twin sister emma said : `` we are so proud of what you achieved .
`` you grasped every opportunity that life presented to you , displaying so much passion , enthusiasm and determination in pursuit of your dreams .
`` you grasped every opportunity that life presented to you , displaying so much passion , enthusiasm and determination in pursuit of your dreams .
`` all this without forgetting to care about people , being there for others and having time for those that needed it .
`` we will miss you so much but you will always be in our thoughts , hearts and prayers . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man killed in a50 crash
text: a driver has died in a crash on the a50 in derbyshire .
police said a man in his thirties was killed when his car struck a barrier between the a6 and a38 on the eastbound carriageway at about 15:00 yesterday .
anyone who witnessed the crash or has any useful dashcam footage has been asked to contact derbyshire police by calling 101 .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: soubry : marina death boy 'was trying to help others '
text: the conservative mp for broxtowe wrote this last night - though we 've had no official details on the circumstances around owen jenkins 's death .
thoughts & prayers tonight w family & friends of young beeston lad who lost his life in the trent trying to help others
can you have a memorial bench put near the place in memory of this young hero .
i knew the family and would gladly pay
a bench would be a lovely idea to remember owen jenkins - up to his family & many wld @ like to donate @ twitterid
as mp could you please offically look into the live piece broadcast at 22:30 by @ twitterid thanks
thank u for your tweet and yes i will .
thank you for raising this today .
so many dangers posed by unguarded waters
what a terrible waste of a young life
very sad news anna and such a young age
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

heartbreaking local news tonight .
sending all my love and thoughts to owen jenkins family and friends .
xxx
if anyone can help a little please do he was so kind hearted and deserves an amazing send off .
it 's a close community here , vic .
we 're all in shock .
a true hero .
so sad .
thoughts all thejenkins family xx
i 'm so desperately sorry .
what a brave thing to do .
absolutely devastating , love & thoughts go out to owen 's family & friends
i just heard this morning so shocked , he was a great lad full of beans so sad .
so , so sad
it 's tragic .
heart goes out to his family .
so sad

author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: river at weir a 'very fast current '
text: brad o'riordan , who has a boat at beeston marina , has been commenting on how dangerous the water can be , especially for people who do not know it .
he said : `` the problem over there is while the weir is low , you 've got the hydro station that has taken most of the river water .
`` if you fall into the current on the other side of the weir , it is going to get you , it is a very fast current there .
`` i do n't think kids realise what they are getting into when they go into the water there . ''
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: boy had gone into the river 'but had n't come out '
text: boat owner brad o'riordan said he returned home to beeston marina to see the air ambulance land and emergency services searching for missing owen jenkins
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : river search was 'major operation '
text: incident commander bryn coleman , nottinghamshire fire and rescue said the search for missing owen jenkins was a major operation
author: East Midlands Today

documents.title: at the scene : death will hit 'close knit community '
text: i 'm at beeston marina this morning following the terrible news overnight .
it 's very quiet here at the moment but i spoke to a man who lives on a barge on the river trent .
he told me that last night the atmosphere was grim with hundreds of people helping in the search for missing owen jenkins after he fell into the river .
both the barge owner and a dog walker told me it 's a close knit community and this will hit hard .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your tributes : body find 'terrible news '
text: you 've been leaving your thoughts on facebook following the news that a body was found in the river trent in the search for missing owen jenkins .
tracie perrin wrote : `` such terrible news .
deepest sympathy goes to his family and friends . ''
jen heyes said : `` how sad , his poor family . ''
dee chettle added : `` my deepest sympathy to his family .
author: Facebook

documents.title: beeston marina fall : body found after major search
text: emergency services were called out to beeston marina last night after reports a 12-year-old boy had fallen into the river trent .
a major search operation was launched with more than 30 firefighters , dozens of police officers and support from the helicopter and underwater search teams .
but the police confirmed at about 22:00 last night that a body had been found in the river .
although the body has n't been officially identified , he has been named locally as owen jenkins .
author: Ben Truslove
BBC News Online

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live news coverage
text: good morning and welcome to this morning 's live page .
we 're bringing you all the latest after police searching for a missing 12-year-old boy found a body .
a massive operation was launched after owen jenkins fell into the river trent at beeston marina at about 18:00 last night .
you can get in touch with your thoughts and tributes by email on twitter or facebook .
